title: Chris Brown Breaks Silence After Karreuche Admits He Used To Beat Her (VIDEO) | NOW 1051
text:
Chris Brown Breaks Silence After Karreuche Admits He Used To Beat Her (VIDEO) posted by Isha Thorpe - A post shared by @chrisbrownofficial on Feb 21, 2017 at 12:22pm PST 
Earlier today (Feb. 21), news broke that Karreuche Tran filed a restraining order against Chris Brown after he threatened to kill her. { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 33210, "name" : "Chris Brown" } } 
In the legal docs that she filed, Kae also stated that "several years ago Chris 'punched me in my stomach twice,' and 'pushed me down the stairs.' This would have been during the time Chris was on probation for the Rihanna beating," TMZ reported . 
Since this news broke, Brown has been on social media speaking about everything EXCEPT the fact that he alleged abused another ex-girlfriend besides Riri...or has he? In an IG post, Breezy seemed to sort of -- and very briefly -- respond to these serious allegations to only began speaking about Soulja Boy and his Party Tour. He's all over the place and doesn't even know which conflict to speak on. What a mess. 
Listen to Brown's confusing words after Kae revealed that he abused her above. 
Photo: Getty Images
